short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Text analysis and translation using Google Gemini AI

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
My Little Translator: AI-Powered Translation & Text Analysis

Description:
My Little Translator is a powerful Chrome extension that leverages Google's advanced Gemini AI to provide high-quality translations and text analysis in 30 different languages.

Key Features:
✨ Smart Translation
- Right-click any text to translate instantly
- Support for 30 major languages
- Context-aware translations powered by Gemini AI
- Dynamic language selection

🎯 Text Analysis & Summarization
- Summarize long texts with AI
- Get concise and clear summaries
- Maintain context and key points
- Available in all supported languages

🌍 Supported Languages:
• English
• Arabic (العربية)
• Bengali (বাংলা)
• Chinese (中文)
• Czech (Čeština)
• Danish (Dansk)
• Dutch (Nederlands)
• Finnish (Suomi)
• French (Français)
• German (Deutsch)
• Greek (Ελληνικά)
• Hebrew (עברית)
• Hindi (हिंदी)
• Hungarian (Magyar)
• Indonesian (Bahasa Indonesia)
• Italian (Italiano)
• Japanese (日本語)
• Korean (한국어)
• Malay (Bahasa Melayu)
• Norwegian (Norsk)
• Polish (Polski)
• Portuguese (Português)
• Romanian (Română)
• Russian (Русский)
• Spanish (Español)
• Swedish (Svenska)
• Thai (ไทย)
• Turkish (Türkçe)
• Ukrainian (Українська)
• Vietnamese (Tiếng Việt)

💡 Easy to Use:
1. Install the extension
2. Select your preferred language
3. Right-click any text to translate or analyze
4. Get instant results!

🔒 Privacy & Security:
• No data collection or tracking
• All processing done through Google's secure API
• Safe and reliable operation

🎁 Free & Premium Features:
Free Version:
• 20 translations/summaries per day
• Access to all 30 languages
• Basic translation and summarization
• Daily usage reset

Premium Version:
• Unlimited translations and summaries
• No daily limits
• Ad-free experience
• Priority support
• Happiness of supporting the developer

💪 Perfect for:
• Students and academics
• Professionals and businesses
• Language learners
• International communication
• Content creators
• Researchers
• Daily browsing
• Anyone working with multiple languages

Get My Little Translator today and break down language barriers with the power of AI!


Version 1.2 Updates:
• No need to enter an API key
• Enhanced UI for better user experience
• Better error handling and stability
• Optimized performance
• Fixed various bugs
